```{r}
library(wehoop)
library(tidyverse)
library(tictoc)
```

```{r}
player_data <- load_wnba_player_box(
  seasons = 2002:2022)
```

```{r}
glimpse(player_data)
```



```{r}
model <- lm(steals ~ athlete_id, data = player_data22)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
plot <- player_data22 %>%
  ggplot(aes(steals, athlete_id, fill = athlete_id)) +
  geom_col() 
plot
```
